campingSites.description: Scenic camping near Noojee with excellent waterfalls.

campingSites.description: Free camping location in Bunyip.

campingSites.description: Powered and unpowered sites by Anderson Inlet.

campingSites.description: Camping on shores of Mallacoota Inlet.

campingSites.description: Next to Botanic Gardens, near East Beach.

campingSites.description: Pet-friendly with heated pools and waterslide.

campingSites.title: Portland Bay Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Clifftop with Southern Ocean views. Whale watching.

campingSites.title: Lake Burrumbeet
campingSites.description: Free camping 20km west of Ballarat.

campingSites.title: Mount Franklin
campingSites.description: 12.5km north of Daylesford. Basic facilities.

campingSites.description: Pine plantations on eastern Grampians. Base for northern exploration.

campingSites.description: Victoria's best-kept secret. Rich in koalas and wildlife.

campingSites.title: Mornington Peninsula NP
campingSites.description: Scenic beachside camping on the peninsula.

campingSites.description: Home of the 12 Apostles. Coastal camping.

campingSites.description: Near the iconic 12 Apostles rock formations.

campingSites.description: Point Addis via Bells Beach coastal camping.

campingSites.description: Spectacular gorge hiking and camping.

campingSites.title: Mt Oberon
campingSites.description: Summit hike with panoramic views.

campingSites.title: Macedon Regional Park
campingSites.description: Day walks and picnic areas near Melbourne.

campingSites.description: Family holiday park in wine country.

campingSites.description: Traditional camping ground.

campingSites.description: Family camping ground.

campingSites.title: Phillip Island
campingSites.description: Famous for penguins and wildlife.

campingSites.title: Squeaky Beach
campingSites.description: Famous squeaky white sand beach.

campingSites.title: Howqua Hills
campingSites.description: River camping near Mt Buller.

campingSites.title: Digger's Track
campingSites.description: Historic gold mining trail camping.

campingSites.title: The Quarries
campingSites.description: Scenic quarry camping in Gippsland.

campingSites.title: Nolans Creek
campingSites.description: Creek-side bush camping.

campingSites.title: Cape Otway
campingSites.description: Historic lighthouse area camping.

campingSites.title: Lorne
campingSites.description: Popular Great Ocean Road town.

campingSites.title: Toolangi State Forest
campingSites.description: Mountain ash forest camping.

campingSites.title: Baw Baw National Park
campingSites.description: Alpine camping and skiing area.

campingSites.title: Daylesford
campingSites.description: Spa country holiday destination.

campingSites.title: Bright
campingSites.description: Gateway to Alpine National Park.

campingSites.title: Lake Eppalock
campingSites.description: Large lake for water sports and fishing.

campingSites.title: Murray River - Echuca
campingSites.description: Historic paddle steamer town on Murray River.

campingSites.title: Lakes Entrance
campingSites.description: Gateway to Gippsland Lakes system.

campingSites.title: Yarrawonga Common
campingSites.description: Free dispersed camping along the Murray River with River Red Gum forests. Pet-friendly with toilet facilities.

campingSites.title: Forges Bend
campingSites.description: Split camp area with two beach access points on the Murray River. Free and pet-friendly with basic toilets.

campingSites.title: Scotts Beach
campingSites.description: Popular free camping on sandy Murray River beach near Cobram. Swimming, fishing, and kayaking.

campingSites.title: Little Toms Beach
campingSites.description: Free bush camping on the Murray River just outside Cobram. One of the most popular free camps in the region.

campingSites.title: Parolas Bend
campingSites.description: Free bush camping on the Ovens River between Yarrawonga and Corowa. Most accessible site in the reserve.

campingSites.title: Mooroopna Common
campingSites.description: Free camping along the Goulburn River Heritage River near Shepparton. River Red Gum woodland setting.

campingSites.title: Major Creek Reserve
campingSites.description: Free family camping 14km southwest of Nagambie with drop toilets and rainwater access.

campingSites.title: Murchison Camping Area
campingSites.description: Riverside camping and fishing on the Goulburn River south of Murchison. VFA managed site.

campingSites.title: Dimboola Recreation Reserve
campingSites.description: Free camping beside the Wimmera River. Shaded sites near the football ground with dump point nearby.

campingSites.title: Wimmera River Camping
campingSites.description: Crown land camping on banks of the Wimmera River, 18-29km west of Horsham. Fishing and nature walks.

campingSites.title: Kilcunda Oceanview
campingSites.description: Beachfront holiday retreat overlooking Bass Strait between Wonthaggi and San Remo. Ocean view powered sites.

campingSites.title: Cape Paterson Caravan Park
campingSites.description: Family camping near pristine beaches. Close to snorkelling spots for weedy seadragons.

campingSites.title: Powlett River Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Tent-based camping near the Powlett River mouth. Peaceful coastal setting on the Bass Coast.

campingSites.title: Glen Cromie Reserve
campingSites.description: 55-acre Gippsland retreat on the Tarago River with bushwalking and family camping.

campingSites.title: Toorongo Valley Campground
campingSites.description: Free state forest camping near Noojee with 40 sites. Pet-friendly with hiking and fishing trails.

campingSites.title: The Gums Campground
campingSites.description: 18 campsites nestled among tall eucalypts and ferns. Perfect base for exploring Kinglake NP, only 65km from Melbourne.

campingSites.title: Boar Gully
campingSites.description: Remote bush camping with 7 sites in northern Brisbane Ranges. Drop toilets and water tank available.

campingSites.title: Fridays Campground
campingSites.description: 10 campsites near historic ghost town of Steiglitz. Trailhead for the 40km Burchell Trail.

campingSites.title: Marysville Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Gateway to Lake Mountain Alpine Resort. Powered and unpowered sites in tall forest setting.

campingSites.title: Narbethong Free Camp
campingSites.description: Free bush camping on Winch Road near Narbethong. Close to Black Spur drive and waterfalls.

campingSites.title: Delatite Arm Reserve
campingSites.description: 24 free camping sites on Lake Eildon's southern shore. Popular for fishing, swimming, and kayaking.

campingSites.title: Mansfield Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Gateway to Mt Buller and Lake Eildon. Family park with powered sites and modern amenities.

campingSites.title: Bonnie Doon Caravan Park
campingSites.description: Camping with views of Lake Eildon. Close to fishing, boating, and High Country access.

campingSites.title: Beechworth Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Pet-friendly park near Chiltern-Mt Pilot National Park. Close to historic gold rush town.

campingSites.title: Reedy Creek Bush Camp
campingSites.description: Free bush camping along Reedy Creek in box-ironbark forest. Popular with prospectors and bushwalkers.

campingSites.title: Wenhams Camp
campingSites.description: Free camping base for exploring granitic hills walking tracks. Suitable for tents and caravans with toilets and picnic tables.

campingSites.title: Killawarra Forest Camp
campingSites.description: Historic WWII internment camp site surrounded by Box-Ironbark woodland. Free camping with fire places.

campingSites.title: Wilsons Bend
campingSites.description: Dispersed bush camping along the Ovens River with sandy beaches and river access near Wangaratta.

campingSites.title: Winton Wetlands
campingSites.description: Camping near Australia's largest wetland restoration project. Birdwatching, fishing, and nature trails.

campingSites.title: Queenscliff Tourist Park
campingSites.description: Beachside camping on the Bellarine Peninsula with ocean view cabins and powered sites.

campingSites.title: Royal Park Campground
campingSites.description: Foreshore camping among Coastal Moonah trees with beach access. Seasonal November to April.

campingSites.title: Barwon Heads Riverside
campingSites.description: 220+ unpowered riverside sites near the Bellarine Peninsula. Budget-friendly family camping.

campingSites.title: Torquay Foreshore Caravan Park
campingSites.description: Camping at Australia's surfing capital. Start of the Great Ocean Road near Bells Beach.

campingSites.title: Aireys Inlet Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Tent sites on the Great Ocean Road. Close to Split Point Lighthouse and Surf Coast Walk.

campingSites.title: Hammonds Campground
campingSites.description: Bush camping 12km inland from Aireys Inlet. Kangaroos, walking and mountain biking trails.

campingSites.title: Mayford Campground
campingSites.description: One of the best camping spots in Victorian High Country. Grassy sites beside the Dargo River with mountain views.

campingSites.title: Dargo High Plains Camp
campingSites.description: Free dispersed camping along the Dargo High Plains Road at 29km from Dargo. Basic amenities with great alpine views.

campingSites.title: Dargo River Camping
campingSites.description: Walk-in camping and fishing on the banks of the Dargo River, 8km south of Dargo township.

campingSites.title: Buchan Caves Campground
campingSites.description: 41 powered and 20 unpowered sites near limestone caves. Hot showers, laundry, and camp kitchen.

campingSites.title: Native Dog Flat
campingSites.description: Basic alpine camping at 1400m altitude near headwaters of Buchan River. Connects Buchan to Omeo valley.

campingSites.title: Snowy River Rest Area
campingSites.description: Free camping along the Snowy River between Orbost and Marlo. Self-sufficient only, no facilities.

campingSites.title: Cann River Rainforest Camp
campingSites.description: Free grassy campground on river banks surrounded by forest. Loop walk for lyrebird spotting. 72-hour limit.

campingSites.title: Genoa Campground
campingSites.description: Free community camp with toilet block, BBQ, playground. 10 minutes from NSW border, 20 minutes from Mallacoota.

campingSites.title: Timbarra Campground
campingSites.description: Maintained camping sites in the East Gippsland hills, 23km northwest of Buchan. Toilet facilities and firepits.

campingSites.title: Mueller River Campground
campingSites.description: 8 campsites on banks of Mueller Inlet. Access via Point Hicks Road off Tamboon Road from Cann River.

campingSites.title: Point Nepean Discovery Tents
campingSites.description: Unique canvas tent camping in historic Quarantine Station precinct. Timber platforms with stretcher beds. September to April.

campingSites.title: Lakes and Craters Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Set on a ridge between Lake Bullen Merri and Lake Gnotuk. Panoramic crater views with powered and unpowered sites.

campingSites.title: Dargile Campground
campingSites.description: Box-ironbark forest camping near Lake Eppalock. Rich birdlife and gold mining history. Free camping.

campingSites.title: Larni Yirrip Camping Village
campingSites.description: Dja Dja Wurrung cultural campground in Box Ironbark forest. Shelters, frog ponds, and landscaped trails.

campingSites.title: Waanyarra Recreation Site
campingSites.description: Large campground popular for bushwalking and gold prospecting in Dunolly State Forest.

campingSites.title: Aysons Reserve
campingSites.description: Free camping along the Campaspe River, 40 minutes from Bendigo. Swimming, fishing, and birdwatching.

campingSites.title: Slaty Creek Campground
campingSites.description: Three bush camping areas along Slaty Creek. Gold panning, birdwatching, and bushwalking. Free, no bookings.

campingSites.title: Enfield State Park
campingSites.description: 4,400-hectare state park with multiple camping areas. Dog-friendly with walking, cycling, and 4WD tracks.

campingSites.title: Moleside Canoe Camp
campingSites.description: Canoe-access-only camping on the Glenelg River. Part of the 75km canoe trail from Dartmoor to Nelson.

campingSites.title: Wilson Hall Campground
campingSites.description: 12 car-based camping sites on the Glenelg River. Accessible by road in the national park.

campingSites.title: Forest Camp North
campingSites.description: 3 car-based camping sites in River Red Gum forest along the Glenelg River.

campingSites.title: JB Plain Camping Area
campingSites.description: Walk-in camping between Hotham Village and Dinner Plain. Toilets, picnic tables, and fireplaces. Great for snow camping.

campingSites.title: Buckety Plain
campingSites.description: Bogong High Plains camping east of Falls Creek. Toilets, picnic tables, and fireplaces provided.

campingSites.title: Raspberry Hill
campingSites.description: High plains camping with horse yards available. Sub-alpine setting east of Falls Creek.

campingSites.title: Mountain Creek
campingSites.description: Camping at the foot of Mt Bogong near Tawonga. Starting point for Bogong summit walks.

campingSites.title: Pineapple Flat
campingSites.description: Camping beside the King River. Best accessed by 4WD. Popular for horse riding and bush camping.

campingSites.title: Farm to Sea Camp
campingSites.description: 50 acres of grassy gum-tree-lined camping with 9 spacious tent and RV sites near Bells Beach.

campingSites.title: Warragul Gardens Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Family holiday park in West Gippsland with BBQ areas, showers, and swimming facilities.

campingSites.title: Discovery Parks Nagambie Lakes
campingSites.description: Gum-tree-filled grounds on Nagambie Lakes. Tent, caravan, and cabin options in the Goulburn Valley wine region.

campingSites.title: Euroa Caravan Park
campingSites.description: Caravan park in the Strathbogie Ranges. Quiet stopover between Melbourne and the High Country.

campingSites.title: Ovens River Dispersed Camping
campingSites.description: Free dispersed camping along the Ovens River near Wangaratta. Sandy beaches, fishing, no facilities.

campingSites.title: Kendalls Campground
campingSites.description: Forest camping near Rubicon River. Close to historic timber tramway walks and Marysville.

campingSites.title: Lake Mountain Road Camp
campingSites.description: Free roadside bush camping along Lake Mountain Road. Gateway to alpine snow play area.

campingSites.title: Jawbone Creek
campingSites.description: Free bush camping on Jawbone Creek Track near Taggerty. Secluded creek-side setting.

campingSites.title: Big River State Forest Camp
campingSites.description: Remote state forest camping in the upper Yarra catchment. Mountain ash forests and fern gullies.

campingSites.title: Goughs Bay Camping
campingSites.description: Lakeside camping at Goughs Bay on Lake Eildon. Boat ramp access for fishing and water sports.

campingSites.title: Raids Inlet
campingSites.description: Free camping on Delatite Plantation Road at Lake Eildon. Bush setting with lake access.

campingSites.title: Hepburn Springs Camp
campingSites.description: Bush camping in the spa country near mineral springs. Walking trails through forest and fern gullies.

campingSites.title: Notleys Campground
campingSites.description: Free camping in the Whipstick area of Greater Bendigo NP. Box-ironbark forest with gold mining history.

campingSites.title: Englishs Bridge Reserve
campingSites.description: Free streamside camping and swimming on the Campaspe River, 30 minutes from Bendigo.

campingSites.title: BIG4 Bellarine Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Modern park in the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula. Large powered sites with family bathrooms and camp kitchens.

campingSites.title: Wye River Foreshore
campingSites.description: Beachside camping in a small coastal village on the Great Ocean Road. Surrounded by Otway rainforest.

campingSites.title: Kennett River Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Camping in a koala hotspot on the Great Ocean Road. Walking trails to Grey River and wild koala colonies.

campingSites.title: Gellibrand River Camp
campingSites.description: Free riverside camping in the Otway hinterland. Quiet forest setting, walking and mountain biking trails.

campingSites.title: Princetown Recreation Reserve
campingSites.description: Budget camping near the Twelve Apostles. Walk to the beach along the Gellibrand River.

campingSites.title: Billy Goat Bend
campingSites.description: Free camping in Mitchell River National Park. River swimming, walking trails, and abundant wildlife.

campingSites.title: Licola Riverside Campground
campingSites.description: Free camping on the Macalister River at Licola. Gateway to Alpine National Park and high country 4WD tracks.

campingSites.title: Jamieson Caravan Park
campingSites.description: River frontage camping in the heart of gold country. Swimming hole, fishing, and historic township.

campingSites.title: Mount Ewen Campground
campingSites.description: Free bush camping on Dargo High Plains in state forest. Remote and peaceful alpine setting.

campingSites.title: Buckland Valley Camping
campingSites.description: Free riverside camping in the Buckland Valley near Bright. Gold panning and swimming in the river.

campingSites.title: Mount Freezeout
campingSites.description: Small picnic and camping area on Dargo High Plains Road, 65km from Dargo. Spectacular alpine views.

campingSites.title: Yackandandah Creek Camp
campingSites.description: Bush camping with campgrounds and toilets along Yackandandah Creek. Gold mining heritage area.

campingSites.title: Woolshed Falls Area
campingSites.description: Day-use and nearby camping area at historic Woolshed Falls. 6km walking track links to Beechworth via the Gorge.

campingSites.title: Tin Hut Track
campingSites.description: Free bush camping with toilets and water. Walking, fishing, and 4WD trails in West Gippsland.

campingSites.title: Lake Bullen Merri
campingSites.description: Volcanic crater lake ideal for fishing and kayaking. Chinook salmon and brown trout. Foreshore access.

campingSites.title: Tower Hill Wildlife Reserve
campingSites.description: Day-use wildlife reserve in extinct volcanic crater. Emus, kangaroos, and koalas. Nearby camping at Koroit.

campingSites.title: Koroit Caravan Park
campingSites.description: Family camping near Tower Hill Wildlife Reserve. Close to beaches and whale watching at Port Fairy.

campingSites.title: Thompsons Beach
campingSites.description: Sandy Murray River beach camping west of Cobram. Free with no facilities, great for swimming.

campingSites.title: Bangerang Park
campingSites.description: Riverfront holiday park on the Murray River at Corowa. Swimming, fishing, and water skiing.

campingSites.title: Cherry Avenue Camping
campingSites.description: Free camping along Cherry Avenue beside the Ovens River in Bright. Walking distance to town.

campingSites.title: Pioneer Park Camping
campingSites.description: Free camping beside the Ovens River in Harrietville. Gateway to Mt Feathertop and Razor Viking Range.

campingSites.title: Mount Beauty Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Base camp for Falls Creek and Mt Bogong. Powered sites with mountain views in Kiewa Valley.

campingSites.title: Happy Valley Free Camp
campingSites.description: Free camping along the Ovens River near Myrtleford. Shaded riverside sites in the Alpine valleys.

campingSites.title: Dinner Plain Camping
campingSites.description: Alpine village camping near Mt Hotham. Access to cross-country trails and high country huts.

campingSites.title: Omeo Bush Camp
campingSites.description: Free camping near historic Omeo township. Gateway to Bogong High Plains and Great Alpine Road.

campingSites.title: Marlo Free Camp
campingSites.description: Free camping where the Snowy River meets the sea. Fishing, surfing, and estuary walks.

campingSites.title: Banksia Bluff Campground
campingSites.description: Coastal camping in banksia woodland. Direct beach access, nature walks, and fishing at Cape Conran.

campingSites.title: Bemm River Campground
campingSites.description: Free camping near Sydenham Inlet. Fishing, canoeing, and bushwalking in East Gippsland.

campingSites.title: Euchre Valley Campground
campingSites.description: Warm temperate rainforest camping in Lind National Park. Rare ferns and ancient forest near Cann River.

campingSites.title: Beehive Creek Falls
campingSites.description: Remote bush camping in far East Gippsland wilderness. Waterfall walks and pristine forest.

campingSites.title: Nelson Rivervu Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Camping on the Glenelg River at Nelson. Base for river canoeing and Princess Margaret Rose Cave.

campingSites.title: Dartmoor Camping Ground
campingSites.description: Start point for the 75km Glenelg River Canoe Trail. Free riverside camping with basic facilities.

campingSites.title: Lake Wartook
campingSites.description: Lakeside camping near the northern Grampians. Fishing, walking, and scenic mountain views.

campingSites.title: Zumsteins Campground
campingSites.description: Camping at MacKenzie Falls precinct. Close to Victoria's largest waterfall and wildflower walks.

campingSites.title: Lake Fyans Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Lakefront camping near Halls Gap in the Grampians. Swimming, fishing, and water sports.

campingSites.title: Hanging Rock Camping
campingSites.description: Camping at iconic Hanging Rock formation. Night walks, wildlife spotting, and scenic picnicking.

campingSites.title: Trentham Falls Camp
campingSites.description: Bush camping near Trentham Falls, the longest single-drop waterfall in Victoria. Forest walks and wildlife.

campingSites.title: Stockyard Camp
campingSites.description: Hike-in camping on the Wilsons Prom northern circuit. Remote bush setting on the Prom's eastern side.

campingSites.title: Refuge Cove
campingSites.description: Remote hike-in beach camping on Prom's east coast. Stunning white sand cove surrounded by granite headlands.

campingSites.title: Waterloo Bay
campingSites.description: Secluded hike-in camping near Refuge Cove. Pristine beach with excellent snorkelling and fishing.

campingSites.title: Tonimbuk Camp
campingSites.description: Free camping in the Bunyip River corridor. 4WD access with walking trails and fishing.

campingSites.title: Strathbogie Ranges Camp
campingSites.description: Free bush camping in moss-covered forest with waterfalls. Seven Creeks area near Euroa.

campingSites.title: Victoria Lake Holiday Park
campingSites.description: Parklands setting on the Goulburn River in Shepparton. Powered sites and cabin accommodation.

campingSites.title: Seymour Goulburn River Camp
campingSites.description: Riverside camping at Seymour on the Goulburn River. Fishing, swimming, and canoeing.

metadata.source: Parks Victoria, Hipcamp, Visit Victoria, Camps Australia Wide, East Gippsland Shire
